process.label: Consultation and Client Onboarding
process.content: Meet with the client to understand their business goals, project requirements, budget, and timeline. Develop a detailed proposal outlining services, deliverables, costs, and timelines. Finalize with a signed contract to formalize the agreement.

process.label: Project Planning
process.content: Introduce the project team to the client, review the project scope, set objectives, and agree on milestones and deadlines. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to develop a tailored strategy for design, development, and marketing.

process.label: Design Phase
process.content: Create mood boards and wireframes to visualize design concepts and website structure. Present initial designs to the client, gather feedback, and make necessary revisions to finalize the graphical elements.

process.label: Development Phase
process.content: Define technical requirements, select appropriate technologies, and gather necessary content. Code and implement the website, ensuring it is responsive, SEO-friendly, and meets accessibility standards. Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance.

process.label: Digital Marketing Phase
process.content: Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy, including SEO, PPC, social media, email marketing, and content marketing. Create and launch marketing campaigns, produce engaging content, and continuously monitor and optimize campaign performance.

process.label: Delivery and Post-Launch Support
process.content: Deploy the website to the live server and ensure everything is functioning as expected. Provide training sessions for the client on managing the website and using digital marketing tools. Supply detailed documentation and user manuals. Offer technical support, regular updates, security patches, and performance monitoring to ensure the project's continued success.
